item.title: 在 OpenAI 大会上，Fidji Simo 将带来 Instacart 和 Meta 的经验教训
item.description: 在 OpenAI 担任新的领导职务后，Fidji Simo 将把她在建立客户忠诚度 — 和处理内部矛盾方面所学到的一切知识付诸实践。【原文：With her new leadership role at OpenAI, Fidji Simo will be expected to bring to bear everything she’s learned about building customer loyalty — and navigating internal drama.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦冲突升级，印度航空运营商股票承压
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 产量激增，印尼力争今年停止大米进口
item.description: 印度尼西亚是世界上最大的主食种植国之一，由于大米产量和库存激增，印度尼西亚今年将数十年来首次停止进口大米。【原文：Indonesia is set to stop importing rice this year for the first time in decades, thanks to surging production and stockpiles in one of the world’s top growers of the staple food.】

item.title: 日本央行加息的长期博弈将继续支撑日本大型银行的发展
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）、瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.）和三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.）将详细说明，在美国关税引发的不确定性中，日本央行提高借贷成本的承诺对利润率的帮助有多大。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc., Mizuho Financial Group Inc. and Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. will detail how much the Bank of Japan’s commitment to raise borrowing costs could help profit margins in the midst of uncertainty sparked by US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普团队在对华谈判中寻求关税削减和稀土减免
item.description: 特朗普政府正准备在周末与中国举行会谈，考虑可能大幅降低关税，以缓和紧张局势，双方将从上个月设定的过高关税水平上削减关税，以缓和双方已经开始感受到的经济痛苦。【原文：The Trump administration is heading into weekend talks with China contemplating a potentially dramatic tariff reduction in a de-escalatory move that would see both sides slash duties from prohibitive levels set last month to temper the economic pain both are already starting to feel.】

item.title: 绕过美元的全球转变正在亚洲形成势头
item.description: 银行和经纪商对绕过美元的货币衍生品的需求不断上升，因为贸易紧张局势为多年来远离美元的转变增添了紧迫感。【原文：Banks and brokers are seeing rising demand for currency derivatives that bypass the dollar, as trade tensions add a sense of urgency to a years-long shift away from the greenback.】

item.title: 泰国亿万富豪的 Frasers 地产公司因新加坡住房业务利润增加
item.description: 泰国亿万富翁 Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi 控制的开发商 Frasers Property Ltd. 公布上半年利润增长，原因是其新加坡住宅业务弥补了澳大利亚和中国市场的下滑，以及利息支出的增加。【原文：Frasers Property Ltd., the developer controlled by Thai billionaire Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi, reported higher first-half profit as its Singapore residential business made up for a slump in Australia and China, along with higher interest payments.】

item.title: 美国关税打击企业，日本四月早期出口放缓
item.description: 由于美国加强了对新车和全面征税的关税行动，日本的出口在 4 月份的前 20 天中有所放缓。【原文：Japan’s exports slowed in the first 20 days of April as the US tariff campaign intensified with new car and across-the-board levies.】

item.title: CoStar 同意以 19.2 亿美元收购房地产门户域名
item.description: Domain 在一份声明中表示，CoStar 集团公司已达成一项具有约束力的交易，将以每股 4.43 澳元的价格收购澳大利亚 Domain 控股公司，该公司的估值为 30 亿澳元（约合 19.2 亿美元）。【原文：CoStar Group Inc. has entered a binding deal to buy Domain Holdings Australia for A$4.43 per share, valuing the company at A$3 billion ($1.92 billion), Domain said in a statement.】

item.title: 牧野铣削股价因收购退出而下跌
item.description: 日本电产株式会社（Nidec Corp.）撤回对这家日本机床制造商的主动收购要约后，牧野铣床公司（Makino Milling Machine Co.【原文：Shares of Makino Milling Machine Co. tumbled as much as 21% on Friday, the most on record, after Nidec Corp. withdrew its unsolicited takeover bid for the Japanese machine tool maker.】

item.title: 卢特尼克警告韩国、日本的交易比英国更复杂
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，与韩国和日本的贸易协议可能需要比唐纳德-特朗普总统周四宣布的与英国的框架协议更长的时间才能完成，这表明一些亚洲伙伴可能需要等待关税减免。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said that trade deals with South Korea and Japan could take significantly more time to complete than the framework agreement President Donald Trump announced Thursday with the UK, in a signal that some Asian partners may have to wait for tariff relief.】

item.title: 市场权衡英美协议影响，黄金走高
item.description: 由于市场消化了新的美英贸易协议，黄金走高。在此之前的一周里，黄金在前两个交易日跳涨了近 6%，随后又回吐了大部分涨幅。【原文：Gold edged higher — after a roller-coaster week in which it jumped almost 6% in the first two sessions before retracing much of those gains — as the market digested the new US-UK trade deal.】

item.title: 日本工资增长放缓，支持日本央行谨慎行事
item.description: 日本 3 月份的名义工资增长放缓幅度超过预期，这进一步表明，在国内外经济风险继续增加的情况下，日本央行有理由谨慎加息。【原文：Growth in Japan’s nominal wages slowed more than expected in March, adding to the case for the Bank of Japan to proceed cautiously with interest-rate hikes as economic risks at home and abroad continue to mount.】

item.title: 英国达成协议后，交易商关注中美贸易谈判，石油上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布与英国达成协议后，市场将注意力转向本周末的中美贸易谈判，石油延续涨势。【原文：Oil extended gains as the market turned its attention to trade talks between the US and China this weekend after President Donald Trump announced an agreement with the UK.】

item.title: 瑞安-雷诺兹的 MNTN 考虑最快下周上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，互联电视广告平台 MNTN 公司在因关税引发的市场波动而推迟计划后，正考虑最快于下周启动首次公开募股。【原文：Connected TV advertising platform MNTN Inc. is considering launching its initial public offering as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter, after delaying its plans amid tariff-induced market volatility.】

item.title: 华侨银行利润超出预期，首席执行官黄宗智保持 2025 年目标不变
item.description: 华侨银行第一季度利润超出预期，原因是财富管理费、交易和保险业务的强劲增长支撑了不温不火的贷款收入。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s first-quarter profit beat expectations, as a strong haul in wealth fees, trading and insurance bolstered tepid lending income.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀率跃升至 5.16%，令所有分析师大吃一惊
item.description: 哥伦比亚 4 月份的通胀率意外飙升，令上周重启宽松货币政策的决策者大吃一惊。【原文：Colombian inflation unexpectedly jumped in April, in an unwelcome surprise for policymakers who restarted monetary easing last week.】

item.title: Fiera 的 Desjardins 将卸任首席执行官，由 Menard 接任
item.description: Fiera Capital Corp. 创始人让-吉-德雅尔丹（Jean-Guy Desjardins）将辞去首席执行官一职，由 Maxime Menard 接替，后者目前是该公司加拿大分部的负责人。【原文：Fiera Capital Corp. founder Jean-Guy Desjardins is stepping down as chief executive officer and will be succeeded by Maxime Menard, who currently heads the firm’s Canada unit.】

item.title: 秘鲁将利率降至 4.5%，通胀缓慢，面临关税风险
item.description: 秘鲁恢复了宽松货币政策，通货膨胀得到了有效控制，但美国关税对其经济构成了越来越大的风险。【原文：Peru resumed monetary easing with inflation firmly under control and US tariffs posing mounting risks to its economy.】

item.title: 亚洲超级富豪因贸易战迅速缩减对美国的风险敞口
item.description: 一些亚洲最富有的家族正在削减对美国资产的风险敞口，称唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施使世界最大经济体的可预测性大大降低。【原文：Some of Asia’s richest families are cutting exposure to US assets, saying President Donald Trump’s tariffs have made the world’s largest economy much less predictable.】

item.title: 日本企业治理浪潮席卷工业中心地带
item.description: 有迹象表明，日本备受推崇的企业改革在席卷东京并帮助提振股价之后，正在深入工业中心名古屋。【原文：Signs are emerging that Japan’s much-touted corporate reforms are reaching the industrial heartland of Nagoya, after sweeping through Tokyo and helping lift share prices.】

item.title: 尽管市场业务下滑，麦格理利润仍超预期
item.description: 由于强劲的资产管理费抵消了大宗商品和全球市场业务的持续疲软，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd. ）的年度利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s annual profit topped analysts’ estimates as strong asset management fees offset continued weakness in its commodities and global markets businesses.】

item.title: 贸易希望提振亚洲股市反弹：市场综述
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布与英国达成贸易协议，并表示如果接下来的谈判进展顺利，对中国商品征收的关税可能会下降，这提振了风险情绪，亚洲股市周五有望上涨。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to gain on Friday after President Donald Trump announced a trade deal with the UK and signaled tariffs on Chinese goods may fall if upcoming talks go well, boosting risk sentiment.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会寻求以 5000 万美元解决与瑞波实验室的法律纠纷
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会就针对瑞波实验室公司（Ripple Labs Inc.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission moved to settle a long-running legal battle against Ripple Labs Inc. as the regulator continues its about-face on crypto cases.】

item.title: 萨拉托加水公司股东寻求 15 亿美元收购股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，隶属于 One Rock Capital Partners 的一对 Primo Brands 公司股东正寻求通过出售股份筹集多达 15 亿美元的资金。【原文：A pair of Primo Brands Corp. stockholders affiliated with One Rock Capital Partners are seeking to raise as much as $1.5 billion in a share sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿尔巴内斯的澳大利亚如何融入特朗普的世界新秩序
item.description:
在本周的澳大利亚播客中：丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）与彭博社专家小组就安东尼-阿尔巴内斯（Anthony Albanese）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump  

On this week’s Australia Podcast: Rebecca Jones speaks with a panel of Bloomberg experts about what’s next for the country in the era of Anthony Albanese and Donald Trump

item.title: 特朗普将终止拜登时代弥合数字鸿沟的计划
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统表示，他将终止一项提供数十亿美元用于扩大服务不足社区互联网接入的计划，并认为该计划基于种族原因提供补助金是不公平的。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would end a program that provides billions to extend internet access in underserved communities, casting it as unfairly providing grants on the basis of race.】

item.title: 硅谷来夺五角大楼的 1 万亿美元预算
item.description:
特朗普政府希望初创企业重塑美国军队，为争夺世界上最大的国防预算创造条件。【原文：

The Trump administration wants startups to remake the US military, setting the stage for a battle over the world’s biggest defense budget.

】

item.title: 据称中国为规避美国关税寻求阿根廷作物
item.description: 中国与阿根廷出口商签署了一份购买约 9 亿美元大豆、玉米和植物油的意向书，这是亚洲国家在唐纳德-特朗普总统发动贸易战期间避免从美国采购的最新迹象。【原文：China signed a letter of intent with exporters in Argentina to buy about $900 million of soybeans, corn and vegetable oil, the latest indication that the Asian nation will avoid sourcing from the US during President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: Adobe 将在国家税务总局审查后降低面向美国政府的软件价格
item.description: 在特朗普政府对软件支出进行严格审查后，Adobe 公司将以折扣价向政府提供一揽子产品。【原文：Adobe Inc. will offer a package of its products to the government at a discounted rate following scrutiny on software spending by the Trump administration.】
